data.name: Bulbasaur
data.description: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pok√©mon is born. The seed slowly grows larger.

data.name: Charmander
data.description: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

data.name: Dratini
data.description: It sheds many layers of skin as it grows larger. During this process, it is protected by a rapid waterfall.

data.name: Eevee
data.description: Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.

data.name: Jigglypuff
data.description: When its huge eyes waver, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.

data.name: Meowth
data.description: All it does is sleep during the daytime. At night, it patrols its territory with its eyes aglow.

data.name: Pikachu
data.description: When it is angered, it immediately discharges the energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.

data.name: Psyduck
data.description: It is constantly wracked by a headache. When the headache turns intense, it begins using mysterious powers.

data.name: Snorlax
data.description: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. When it is done eating, it goes promptly to sleep.

data.name: Squirtle
data.description: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.
